column1: Do you feel mentally exhausted at work?
column2: After a day at work, do you find it hard to recover your energy?
column3: Do you find that everything you do at work requires much effort?
column4: Do you feel physically exhausted at work?
column5: When you get up in the morning, do you lack the energy to start a new day at work?
column6: Do you want to be active at work but find it difficult to manage?
column7: Do you quickly get tired when exerting yourself at work?
column8: Do you feel mentally exhausted and drained at the end of your workday?
column9: Do you struggle to find enthusiasm for your work?
column10: Do you feel indifferent about your job?
column11: Are you cynical about the impact your work has on others?
column12: Do you have trouble staying focused at work?
column13: Do you struggle to think clearly at work?
column14: Are you forgetful and easily distracted at work?
column15: Do you have trouble concentrating while working?
column16: Do you make mistakes at work because your mind is on other things?
column17: Do you feel unable to control your emotions at work?
column18: Do you feel you no longer recognize yourself in your emotional reactions at work?
column19: Do you become irritable when things don't go your way at work?
column20: Do you feel sad or upset at work without knowing why?
